summary: App should support full anonymous usage (no required authentication) for core actions like joining/leaving ponds, changing usernames, and saving avatars; logins may be added later but are not required now.
architectural_notes: For now, treat all users as anonymous; authentication/login is deferred and not required for core actions (pond membership changes, username changes, avatar saving).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove authentication requirements so anonymous users can join/leave ponds, change username, and save avatars
